description:
The law firm of Hershoff, Lupino & Yagel, L.L.P., was founded with the mission to provide quality legal services to both local residents and area visitors. With offices in both Miami and the Florida Keys, the experienced team of lawyers at Hershoff, Lupino & Yagel is prepared to meet the diverse requirements of almost any client requiring representation in Miami, Ocean Reef, Key Largo, Islamorada, Marathon, Key West and the remainder of south Florida.

Having built a reputation for providing diligent, ethical and responsive services, the law firm makes each client a priority. Clients work directly with experienced lawyers who will provide individualized attention. A primary goal of the firm is to achieve results that help clients achieve their long-term objectives.

The law firm's attorneys provide experienced counsel and representation for diverse legal needs, including construction law, real estate, land use, personal injury, criminal defense, family law, business law, civil litigation, wills and probate. Do you need civil litigation assistance with a contract or construction law issue? Do you have a question about real estate title insurance or development rights? Have you been injured in a boating accident or been charged with a criminal offense such as DUI? Whether in Miami or the Florida Keys, the lawyers at Hershoff, Lupino & Yagel will thoroughly evaluate your situation, explain your options and walk you through the legal process.

In addition to obtaining results for clients, the firm's attorneys are very active in the community. Attorneys from the firm are either current or past Boards Members of Mariners Hospital, the Key Largo Chamber of Commerce, the Islamorada Chamber of Commerce, the Upper Keys Rotary Club, Habitat for Humanity of the Upper Keys, the Florida Keys Wild Bird Center and the Islamorada Fishing Club. The firm also sponsors multiple charitable events throughout the year, including the Mariner’s Hospital Health Walk, the Mad Dog Mandich Fishing Tournament and Woofstock, the proceeds of which are donated to charitable organizations.

Lawyers from Hershoff, Lupino & Yagel, LLP have been proudly serving clients in Miami, Ocean Reef, Key Largo, Islamorada, Marathon and Key West for over 30 years.
